title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API that lets you pull, run, and chat with 70+ open-source models (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) on macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async/sync Python client for the Ollama API; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; npm i ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip install langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker with one command.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library published to Maven Central; async & sync APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions collection to pull, benchmark, and cache Ollama models in CI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, fine-tuning, function calling, edge deployment, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes a REST proxy with rate-limiting, auth, and OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing chat UI, admin panel, and async task queue for Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for offline AI autocomplete and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for iOS/macOS apps wanting on-device LLM power through Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama servers on AWS EC2/GCP with GPU auto-selection.
